description: This file initializes and configures a vector database using LanceDB, creates a knowledge base from a PDF URL, loads the knowledge, and sets up an agent to interact with the knowledge base by answering questions.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and retrieving vectorized data.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, integrating with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer questions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
